document_data.name: Red Blade
document_data.symbol: A scarlet sword across a white shield
document_data.mainbody: The '''Red Blade''' was a mercenary company of the mid-3{{rd}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Equipment: The company's men wore [[leather armor]] and were armed. They all had badges with a scarlet sword across a white shield.
document_data.History: In {{yearlink|241}}, they passed through the [[Herald's Horn]] in the [[Western Heartlands]] on their way to the [[Calishar]], where they would seek guard employment. They briefly met with [[Elminster]] and witnessed an argument between two prospectors, [[Surgath Ilder]] and [[Karlmuth Hauntokh]].
